title: 9333 Games Gameboy/GB color on your PC.
description:
It is the popular collection GoodGBx v3.14 which contains all the games of these popular hand-held consoles,together with  emulator to play on your PC.This version is the latest and contains 9333 roms.


Instructions:

First download and unzip the 7zip file.Compressed files is 578 MB and decompresed is about 5 Giga,so make sure you have enough space on your hard drive.After decompressing the files go to file emulator open and run the file BGB.This opens the emulator,now right-click in the window and then Load rom,scan folder roms and you can load any game from the 9333 you want.Good fun!


System Requirements:

win32 i386 (95, 98, ME, NT4, 2000, XP, and, where appropriate, the newer versions of Windows). Also, BGB runs also in Linux.
Compatible with windows and sound card joystick/gamepad is optional. A videocard with DirectDraw hardware acceleration is recommended.

â€¢ Pentium 133-166 MHz or equivalent: GB games and big games GBC run optimal / quickly.
â€¢ Pentium 200-233 MHz or equivalent: Recommended for demanding GBC games.
â€¢ Pentium 300MHz or equivalent: It is recommended that the possibilities for debugging (rivalry with break for exceptions, etc. points stop)

THE emulator has tasted and Window Vista,7,8,10 (32bit/ 64bit) and it works fine
